1.content:

You chuckle from your poor joke. You approach each one of them, feeling their tight stomachs slosh and sway a bit from their feeding. Krystal was the first you see. You give a light tap of the palm onto it, watching it slowly jiggle and settle in place a moan attempted to escape her filled mouth as her tail swished slowly.

Next was Renamon. Her belly was the largest, heavily swollen with custard and making her look she was 3 months overdue with a litter of 3. You give her belly a nice rub, reaching down under her to feel her navel had popped out, feeling hard and smooth. "If it wasn't for me, I would have never guessed this was filled with my concoction.~" You lafugh as Renamon could say nothing, her eyes, as well as the others, were glazed in a food coma. A bit of the fattening goop seeped through her mouth as you scrap it up and clean it off on her swollen gut.

Onto Rouge. Now she had rack to begin with, but currently, she was unbeatable. Her belly stuck out 5 months pregnant, and her ass got some good heft, but her tits recieved the damage of fat, hanging down and as large as watermelons. You heft up one of her breasts, getting a brief moan of pleasure from her, and checking the breast pumps that you had attached to her. She had begun to lactate, not much, but as days go buy, you won't need to buy milk anymore. "Soon enough all of you girls will have pumps to your breasts. It'll be like a family activity!" You laugh and approach the last girl.

The bunny pokemon, Lopunny, was the the most well rounded, in more than one way, of all 4. None of her features were as large as the others, but what others lacked, she had them outbeat. Her ass plump, breasts jiggle, and 9 month round belly made her the best set for you. She was personally your favorite. You gently caress her cheek as she continued to be fed through her clear tube. Her cheeks blushed out as the goop stuck in her mouth and slowly slid down her throat.

You walk back to the middle of the girls, all of them surrounding you, and speak out. "Now..... who should I have fun with today.....?"
1.title: Let the fun begin! ~

14.content:
You decide to take your favorite to the back room the basement. You remove the feeding tub in her mouth, pull slowly on her bondage trap as her huge ears dragged on the floor. As you pull on her, you stop at the middle of room, watching her body softly jiggle and shake until finally settling. You being to slowly pace yourself around the rotund Pokemon, hearing her gasp and pant from her almost 24 hour feeding sesion you just had her go through.

"How are you feeling my dear...?" You ask as you continue to walk around.

"Lo....punny....." Was all she could make, exhausted from her feeding.

"Hmmm.... I might want to know what your saying..." You pull out a translating collar and wrap it around her fattened neck. Luckily it was stretchy and wouldn't choke on her. "How are you feeling?"

"F.......full..... s-swollen...." was all she could gasp out. She could feel the goop try to slowly slide out her throat, but swallowed to keep it down.

"Good! Excatly how I want you to feel." You chuckle as you stop walking and stand in front of her. You place both hands on the sides of her huge gut and rubbed sensually.

"A-ah.... w-why.... are you d...doing this...." A bit of the goop drooled from her mouth as she spoke.

"This is just a long time fantasy I've had.... beautiful creatures made even more beautiful with every pound added on them..." You gently caress her cheek. "Filling you, watching your belly grow rounder and rounder is such an amazing sight for me."

She wanted to flinch from your hand on her cheek, but was oddly calmed by your tone of voice.

"However I know the health risks of something like that happening to anyone. I'm not a heartless man, Just one with a fantasy.... which is why I take care and make sure you are as happy and perfectly safe."

"W-will you... let me go...?" She asked. Her stomach jiggling in mid-air as her bondage shifted a bit.

"Of coarse! Like I said I'm not heartless or evil. I will release all of you in due time...." You begin to pace around her again, sliding your hand around her fattened frame. "You just have to complete one thing for me...." You slyly smile while your hand caresses her bubbly ass. "You're belly must reach the ground. Once that is done, you will be set free."

Her eyes widened. She was 7 feet off the ground. The way she was positioned, she would need her belly to grow 6 more feet outward. "I-I cant do... hmpph..." She swallowed the goop as it attempted to escape again. "...do that..."

"I will make sure you can. You will be safe and healthy, for the most part. From what I estimate it will take you.... 2 months for your belly to reach the ground." You stop in front of her again. "At least... that would be the earliest..." You smile again.

She simply limped her head down in defeat. There was no other way for her. "Fine...... I'll do it...."

You grin again. "Well start out slow for you. ~"
14.title: Lopunny, the well rounded, WELL ROUNDED bunny

info.brief_description: You've captured 4 of the most sexualized characters, and now you control them to your will
info.description: In this story, you've captured 4 of the most sexualized characters, of which are Rouge the Bat, Krystal the blue vixen, Renamon the digital fighter, and Lopunny the playboy Pokemon. Now that all 4 of your dream characters have been bound and caught, you start to fill and feed each one of them, using them as your own sexual toys and fantasy erotica to make them the round. You can start with whom you want to focus on. ~
